item.title: For the record his BAC was .319 and any of us would have our...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

For the record his BAC was .319 and any of us would have our license suspended for this. Instead Velez will be back at work in 10 funky little days ruining people‚Äôs lives for the same. Tax dollars hard at work y‚Äôall. #DefundThePolice

Deputy Jonathan Velez's suspension for the incident will last 10 days, without pay.

9news.com

Denver sheriff's deputy suspended after crashing car while drunk with a minor, discipline letter says

Deputy Jonathan Velez's suspension for the incident will last 10 days, without pay.Deputy Jonathan Velez's suspension for the incident will last 10 days, without pay.
item.author: Black Lives Matter 5280

item.title: #CALLTOACTION We are infuriated. In the midst of an uprising of global proportions fueled by the worldwide demanding of...
item.content:encoded:
#CALLTOACTION We are infuriated. In the midst of an uprising of global proportions fueled by the worldwide demanding of #justiceforBlacklives, the justice system is still being weaponized against us in real time. With the entire world hyper-focused on racial injustice white supremacists have doubled down in full confidence that they will be protected by the justice department above all else. Boulder DA's Office, 20th Judicial District - DA Michael Dougherty is functioning as a vehicle of white supremacy in his refusal to drop these trumped up charges against this sister after years of enduring vile behaviors like the use of racial slurs against her children. We are in fierce support of Mrs. Jeweldine Kastman and her family, and we demand a full dismissal of all charges against them. Call Da Dougherty’s office and demand he dismiss this case today and everyday until it is done! (720) 470-7871
Boulder County case number 19CR1876
#DefundPolice #DefendBlackLife #AbolishthePolice #AbolitionNOW #BlackLivesMatter #BLM5280 #solidarity
Boulder DA's Office, 20th Judicial District - DA Michael Dougherty

[Image Description: BLM5280 letterhead featuring the BLM5280 skyline logo on a white background with a deep grey border reading the following:
November 11 2020
We, the members of Black Lives Matter 5280, after careful consideration of Mrs. Jeweldine Kastman’s case, believe she has been the victim of prejudice in the criminal justice system. Our core values demand we take personal responsibility for denouncing the kind of discrimination, harassment, and racism Mrs. Kastman has experienced in Boulder County. Further, we believe the District Attorney has a responsibility to the public to reexamine her case through an unbiased lens. We believe that acknowledgment and reconsideration of the implicit biases in this case should lead to the conclusion that the interests of justice require that Mrs. Kastman's case be dismissed.
Mrs. Kastman moved to Colorado just a couple of years ago having never experienced the kind of blatant racism she would encounter from her neighbors here. cont. in comments]

item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

‚úäüèæ‚úäüèæ‚úäüèæ

BLM 5280 Freedom School

After hearing that the Boulder Valley school board was having a vote on removing SRO‚Äôs from their schools last night, one of our brilliant and passionate studen...ts took it upon himself to email the board reminding them of a letter he sent back in July! One of our 2020 Freedom School summer classes helped students write letters to local representatives expressing their stance on issues important to them. We are so proud of D for taking the initiative then and now to address such an important and impactful issue! Powerful words, D! ‚úäüèΩ

Sanna Alice Nanna-Andraste

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Second Chance Center is sharing a COVID-19 Update.Given the rapid and sustained increase in COIVID cases, The Aurora...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Second Chance Center is sharing a COVID-19 Update.

Given the rapid and sustained increase in COIVID cases, The Aurora Day of Giving will be modified from in person events in November and December to protect the... health and safety of volunteers. Food and Resources will be available through various nonprofit partners for Distribution in Aurora. Food , baby items, toiletries, first aid items will be provided to families.
#COVIDFoodresources

#foodresources

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280No-Cap CoalitionWe are excited to share with you all our first Mutual Aid Project. We will be fundraising online to...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280No-Cap Coalition

We are excited to share with you all our first Mutual Aid Project. We will be fundraising online to put together Mutual Aid/Winter Care Packages to distribute ...to our houseless neighbors in the Denver area. If you would like to donate your time as a volunteer to help put together supplies, or distribute please fill out the google form linked below!

Volunteer Google Form:
https://tinyurl.com/NO-CAPVolunteerForm

Donate:
Venmo- @nocapcoalition
Cash app- $NOCAPCoalition
https://no-capcoalition.org/Donate

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280+3Tigray CommunitiesWhat‚Äôs Happening in Northern Ethiopia (Tigray)? With the war that is currently being waged...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280+3Tigray Communities

What‚Äôs Happening in Northern Ethiopia (Tigray)?

With the war that is currently being waged against the people of Tigray, it is essential that we be the voice f...or our voiceless Tigrayan brothers and sisters back home. The infographic below provides a brief summary of what‚Äôs going on, the events that have led up to this point, and what we can do to make a difference!

Please refer to the following link (https://linktr.ee/istandwithtigray) for a full list of resources in the fight for our people including the Campaign for Peace petition and ‚ÄúI STAND WITH TIGRAY 2020‚Äù Google Drive folder which houses email templates, phone scripts, and contact information for organizations and elected officials.

Let‚Äôs come together to support our people! #IStandWithTigray ‚ù§Ô∏èüíõ‚úäüèæ

The state of Africa should be our focus.

item.title: #DEMANDS...
item.content:encoded:
#DEMANDS
Immediately fire and revoke the pensions of the officers that murdered Breonna.
Divest from LMPD and Invest in community building
Immediate resignation (or impeachment) of Mayor Greg Fisher
Metro Council ends use of force by Louisville Metro Police Department.
Police shootings are gun violence.
A local, civilian community police accountability council that is independent from the Mayor’s Office and LMPD with investigation and discipline power #CPAC.
The creation of policy to ensure transparent investigation processes
#JusticeforBre #SayHerName
#DefundPolice #DefendBlackLife #KeepGoing #BlackLivesMatterLouisville #JusticeForBreonnaTaylor #InvestDivest

item.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280‚Äôs Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...

coloradogives.org
